markdownRemark.html:
Location: Hochiminh city, Vietnam

You will be joining a project which talented software engineers in our Digital Bank Build team who is responsible for designing, building and maintaining the new digital banking platform and the customer channels. As part of the team, you will be responsible for implementing software features, involve in technical designs and writing tests to ensure the high quality delivery of the product. The teams operate in Scrum and DevOps model.

Responsibilities:

  • Willing to work on the entire stack, from infrastructure, API to front-end
  • Solving complex technical and business problems and learn new technology and frameworks.
  • Custodian of Development Best practices, Development Technology direction/roadmap and application.

Must Have:

  • Have strong knowledge, in developing high scalable Java-based backend web service using the Spring framework, Java/Linux stack, JPA, Hibernate, MySQL and the relevant technologies
  • Have basic knowledge, at least 1 year experienced, in develop frontend application for at least one the following areas: Android native app, iOS native app or Modern Web using HTML5, CSS 3, ES6 and React JS/Angular 2x or the similar
  • Deep understanding of Object-Oriented programming, OOP design patterns and the SOLID principles
  • Good problem-solving skills, able to work individually as well as in team

Nice to have:

  • Experience in AWS, Ansible, Docker, Rancher, K8s is a big plus
  • Experienced in automated testing frameworks is a plus
  • Experience working in banking and financial domain is a plus

Why You’ll Love Working Here

  • Salary review: 1 times/year
  • 13-month bonus program
  • People focus workplace: healthy environment, encourage positive differences and innovation
  • Company Trip once a year
  • All insurances according to Vietnamese Labor law

Please email your resume to Datum Career for positions in Vietnam, indicating the role you are applying for in the subject line.
